name: Herald Of Undeath
resist: cold, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Creeping Death
text: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the herald must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The herald's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
text: The herald has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The herald of undeath makes two reaping scythe attacks or uses its Ray of Annihilation twice. If both reaping scythe attacks hit the same target, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or it is reduced to 0 hp.

action.name: Reaping Scythe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Ray of Annihilation
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be blinded for 1 round.
